name: Tier 2 Spell Critical Hits (Levels 5-8)
description: Critical hit effects for spell attacks at Tier 2 (Levels 5-8). Effects are more impactful for competent adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your critical spell deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Arcane Burn - Magical energy sears the target. They take 1d8 force damage at the start of each turn for 2 rounds.
Magic Disruption - Your spell disrupts their magical abilities. Target has disadvantage on spell attacks and concentration checks for 1 minute.
Powerful Knockback - The force of your spell sends the target flying. They are pushed 15 feet and fall prone.
Concentration Shatter - If the target is concentrating, their concentration automatically fails.
Elemental Surge - Your spell's element flares dramatically. Add 2d6 damage of the spell's type.
Spell Echo - Your spell echoes with power. You may cast the same cantrip again as a bonus action.
Perfect Casting - Your spell is cast with incredible efficiency. Regain 1 expended spell slot up to 2nd level.
